Source.Name: trayer
Source.Summary: trayer-srg is a lightweight GTK2-based systray for UNIX desktop
Source.Description: trayer is small program designed to provide systray functionality present in GNOME/KDE desktop enviroments for window managers which doesn't support that function. It's similar to other applications such as 'peksystray' and 'docker'.

Package.Name: trayer
Package.Summary: trayer-srg is a lightweight GTK2-based systray for UNIX desktop
Package.Description: trayer is small program designed to provide systray functionality present in GNOME/KDE desktop enviroments for window managers which doesn't support that function. It's similar to other applications such as 'peksystray' and 'docker'.
